includedAssets.title: A Change Is Gonna Come
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep1 - A Change Is Gonna Come
includedAssets.synopsis: Picking up where season three left off, Cristina returns from her honeymoon to find Burke long gone. Bailey is struggling to accept Callie's new role too.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Cristina returns from her honeymoon to find Burke long gone. Bailey is struggling to accept Callie's new role too.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Picking up where season three left off, Cristina returns from her honeymoon to find Burke long gone. Bailey is struggling to accept Callie's new role too.

includedAssets.title: Love/Addiction
includedAssets.synopsis: The team are inundated with patients from an apartment explosion; Burke's mother comes to pick up his remaining things; and Lexie tries to make up with Meredith.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The team are inundated with patients from an apartment explosion and Burke's mother comes to pick up his remaining things.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The team are inundated with patients from an apartment explosion; Burke's mother comes to pick up his remaining things; and Lexie tries to make up with Meredith.

includedAssets.title: Let The Truth Sting
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep3 - Let The Truth Sting
includedAssets.synopsis: George impresses the new interns whilst trying to keep his 'repeater' status under wraps. Elsewhere, Lexie faces her first emergency situation.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: George impresses the new interns whilst trying to keep his 'repeater' status under wraps. Elsewhere, Lexie faces her first emergency situation.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: George impresses the new interns whilst trying to keep his 'repeater' status under wraps. Elsewhere, Lexie faces her first emergency situation.

includedAssets.title: The Heart of the Matter
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep4 - The Heart of the Matter
includedAssets.synopsis: While Izzie reveals her feelings for George to a mutual friend with surprising results, Derek gives Cristina lessons on how to improve her teaching.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Izzie reveals her feelings for George to a mutual friend with surprising results, Derek gives Cristina lessons on how to improve her teaching.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Izzie reveals her feelings for George to a mutual friend with surprising results, Derek gives Cristina lessons on how to improve her teaching.

includedAssets.title: Haunt You Every Day
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep5 - Haunt You Every Day
includedAssets.synopsis: It's Halloween at the hospital and Meredith thinks she's being haunted by her mother's ashes. Meanwhile, George and Izzie's relationship is rumbled.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: It's Halloween at the hospital and Meredith thinks she's being haunted by her mother's ashes. Meanwhile, George and Izzie's relationship is rumbled.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: It's Halloween at the hospital and Meredith thinks she's being haunted by her mother's ashes. Meanwhile, George and Izzie's relationship is rumbled.

includedAssets.title: Kung Fu Fighting
includedAssets.synopsis: Chief Webber invites the male surgeons on a 'gentlemen's evening', while Cristina and Izzie vie for surgeries to impress the new cardiothoracic attending.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Chief Webber invites the male surgeons on a 'gentlemen's evening', while Cristina and Izzie try to impress the new cardiothoracic attending.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Chief Webber invites the male surgeons on a 'gentlemen's evening', while Cristina and Izzie vie for surgeries to impress the new cardiothoracic attending.

includedAssets.title: Physical Attraction... Chemical Reaction
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep7 - Physical Attraction... Chemical Reaction
includedAssets.synopsis: Derek and Meredith's relationship is tested as he suggests it become more serious, and Callie's Chief Residency hangs by a thread.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Derek and Meredith's relationship is tested as he suggests it become more serious, and Callie's Chief Residency hangs by a thread.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Derek and Meredith's relationship is tested as he suggests it become more serious, and Callie's Chief Residency hangs by a thread.

includedAssets.title: Forever Young
includedAssets.synopsis: Chaos reigns as a tumult of patients from a school bus accident is admitted to the ER, Bailey treats a high school crush & Thatcher arrives looking for Meredith.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The victims of a school bus accident are admitted to the ER, Bailey treats a high school crush & Thatcher arrives looking for Meredith.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Chaos reigns as a tumult of patients from a school bus accident is admitted to the ER, Bailey treats a high school crush & Thatcher arrives looking for Meredith.

includedAssets.title: Crash Into Me Part 1
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep9 - Crash Into Me Part 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Meredith & Wiggens rush to the scene of a horrific ambulance crash, Bailey treats a difficult patient and Ava finds out about Alex's new girlfriend.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Meredith & Wiggens rush to the scene of a horrific ambulance crash, Bailey treats a difficult patient and Ava finds out about Alex's new girlfriend.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Meredith & Wiggens rush to the scene of a horrific ambulance crash, Bailey treats a difficult patient and Ava finds out about Alex's new girlfriend.

includedAssets.title: Crash Into Me Part 2
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep10 - Crash Into Me Part 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Lexie desperately tries to save Nick (Seth Green), while Meredith rushes to help a trapped paramedic. Derek faces a technology crisis in the OR.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Lexie desperately tries to save Nick (Seth Green), while Meredith rushes to help a trapped paramedic. Derek faces a technology crisis in the OR.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Lexie desperately tries to save Nick (Seth Green), while Meredith rushes to help a trapped paramedic. Derek faces a technology crisis in the OR.

includedAssets.title: Lay Your Hands On Me
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep11 - Lay Your Hands On Me
includedAssets.synopsis: While Bailey faces a traumatic medical problem in the family and a failing marriage, Calllie and Alex are introduced to a faith healer.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Bailey faces a traumatic medical problem in the family and a failing marriage, Calllie and Alex are introduced to a faith healer.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Bailey faces a traumatic medical problem in the family and a failing marriage, Calllie and Alex are introduced to a faith healer.

includedAssets.title: Where The Wild Things Are
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep12 - Where The Wild Things Are
includedAssets.synopsis: Derek's ill-advised relationship with Rose forges on; the residents compete in a surgical contest; and George and Lexie adjust to their new flat.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Derek's ill-advised relationship with Rose forges on; the residents compete in a surgical contest; and George and Lexie adjust to their new flat.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Derek's ill-advised relationship with Rose forges on; the residents compete in a surgical contest; and George and Lexie adjust to their new flat.

includedAssets.title: Piece Of My Heart
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep13 - Piece Of My Heart
includedAssets.synopsis: Addison returns to the hospital to perform an operation and Meredith and Derek's clinical trial gets underway. Elsewhere, Alex receives some shocking news.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Addison returns to the hospital to perform an operation and Meredith and Derek's clinical trial gets underway. Alex receives some shocking news,
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Addison returns to the hospital to perform an operation and Meredith and Derek's clinical trial gets underway. Elsewhere, Alex receives some shocking news.

includedAssets.title: The Becoming
includedAssets.synopsis: The hospital staff create a new 'Date and Tell' policy and Cristina is forced to deal with her feelings for Burke. Callie takes much-needed comfort in Sloane too.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The hospital staff create a new 'Date and Tell' policy and Cristina is forced to deal with her feelings for Burke.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The hospital staff create a new 'Date and Tell' policy and Cristina is forced to deal with her feelings for Burke. Callie takes much-needed comfort in Sloane too.

includedAssets.title: Losing My Mind
includedAssets.synopsis: While Meredith is forced to carry on with her therapy, Alex learns the truth about Rebecca. Cristina is still acting very oddly as well...

includedAssets.title: Freedom Part 1
includedAssets.synopsis: In the first part of the season finale Meredith and Derek persevere with their clinical trial, and the team try to free a young boy from a block of concrete.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In the first part of the season finale Meredith and Derek persevere with their clinical trial, and the team try to free a young boy from a block of concrete.

includedAssets.title: Freedom Part 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Season four concludes as the team face a race against time to save a young patient, Lexie learns a secret about George and Izzie, and Alex looks after Rebecca.

includedAssets.title: Season 4
includedAssets.synopsis: In season four of the medical drama, the surgeons graduate to resident status. But one must repeat their intern year.

includedIn.title: Grey’s Anatomy
includedIn.synopsis: The surgical interns, residents and attendings of Seattle Grace Hospital juggle increasingly complicated procedures and personal lives, while learning what it means to be a good doctor.
